mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT result1.*, ROWNUM rnum FROM (SELECT * FROM notice ORDER BY nNo DESC) result1) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice (nNo, nTitle, nContent, regdate) values(notice_seq.NEXTVAL, #{nTitle}, #{nContent}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT nNo,nTitle,nContent, nViewCount , TO_CHAR(regdate,'YY.MM.DD HH24:MI') AS regdate FROM notice WHERE nNo=#{nNo}
